content:
path /v3/xdc/account/balance/address
operationid xdcgetbalance
parameters
description account address you want to get balance of
in path
name address
required true
schema
type string
summary get xdc account balance
description 1 credit per api call
get account balance in xdc this method does not prints any balance of the erc20 or erc721 tokens on the account
responses
200
schema
type object
balance
type string
description balance in xdc
description ok
tag_summary:
xdc network xinfin is enterprise ready hybrid blockchain for global trade and finance combining the power of public  private blockchains with interoperable smart contracts

tatum supports 2 chains
mainnet  a regular live chain
testnet  a chain used for testing purposes coins on the test chain have no value and can be obtained from
a faucet eg https//apothemnetwork/#gettestxdc
title: 50_XinFin_XdcGetBalance_449.json
